google_play_reviews.content: Great app and a very supportive developer who responded to a reported issue and fixed it in two days.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Seems that it lost two stars. The app is open source, without adds and free of charge. Please support the development and report bugs at https://github.com/badaix/snapdroid instead of giving bad ratings. I will remove the app from the store when it drops below 4.5 stars.
